title: 59 SKIPPING ROCK WAY BEAUITFUL FULLY FURNISHED NORTH NAPA HOME
map_address: Skipping rock way near Wild Rye Way
posting_body: BEAUTIFUL FULLY FURNISHED NORTH NAPA HOME!
A stylish and welcoming home with an open kitchen, dining room and lounge all make for exquisite entertaining.
The private, shaded courtyard is a welcome escape and great for outdoor dining with family and or friends.
Lots of counter space allows for work or sit on the front patio in the sun.
Three bedrooms located on the 2nd floor.
A spacious master bedroom with a king bed and master bath with walk in closet.
The additional south facing and sunlit bedrooms (2) have full size beds and a full bathroom to share between them.
FULLY FURNISHED NORTH NAPA HOME
- THREE BEDROOMS
- TWO AND A HALF BATHS
- 1713 SQUARE FEET
- STAINLESS STEEL REFRIGERATOR INCLUDED
- STAINLESS STEEL GAS RANGE INCLUDED
- STAINLESS STEEL MICROWAVE INCLUDED
- STAINLESS STEEL DISHWASHER INCLUDED
- WASHER AND DRYER INCLUDED
- YARD SERVICE CAN BE PROVIDED FOR ADDITIONAL $200/MO.
PLEASE NOTE:
Our office requires that an application be filled out prior to scheduling appointments to view the home.
You may do so online at <URL> or in our office at 1601 Lincoln Ave. in Napa.
(online is preferred)
Once you complete the application and identify the property(ies) the corresponding manager will be notified and contact you to schedule a time to view the home.
